name: Readiness endpoint /readyz
description: Tests the /readyz endpoint for server readiness status

steps.name: returns 200 OK when server is ready
REQUIRE: Request should complete without error
REQUIRE: Response should not be nil

parameters.name: Actual
parameters.value: *integration_tests.APIResponse(&integration_tests.APIResponse{StatusCode:200, Body:[]uint8{}, Headers:http.Header{"Alt-Svc":[]string{"h3=\":443\"; ma=86400"}, "Cf-Cache-Status":[]string{"DYNAMIC"}, "Cf-Ray":[]string{"9bef98ad09a5a277-IAD"}, "Content-Length":[]string{"0"}, "Date":[]string{"Fri, 16 Jan 2026 18:15:07 GMT"}, "Nel":[]string{"{\"report_to\":\"cf-nel\",\"success_fraction\":0.0,\"max_age\":604800}"}, "Report-To":[]string{"{\"group\":\"cf-nel\",\"max_age\":604800,\"endpoints\":[{\"url\":\"https://a.nel.cloudflare.com/report/v4?s=6KJWqnMTQ0nN15BcdIcQ0gaSL58g9HNxDgoCMpXDutvZLRKHzfTO8b%2FW%2FDJoky1P4wLzY5ykL%2B7ddW6e43Qv9%2BmyGXHW76JKRzTSkYn%2BwW%2FuQwGpVlsF\"}]}"}, "Server":[]string{"cloudflare"}, "Strict-Transport-Security":[]string{"max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains"}, "Vary":[]string{"Origin"}, "X-Content-Type-Options":[]string{"nosniff"}, "X-Frame-Options":[]string{"SAMEORIGIN"}, "X-Request-Id":[]string{"e823454a422d14d2df079a3a11ec98e0"}, "X-Xss-Protection":[]string{"1; mode=block"}}})
